abstract: An advertising agency in the Kurdish region of Iraq joins Icom, a worldwide network of independent advertising agencies.
snippet: An advertising agency in the Kurdish region of Iraq joins Icom, a worldwide network of independent advertising agencies.
lead_paragraph: Edicoo, the name of a new member of Icom, a worldwide network of independent advertising agencies, is odd, but certainly not unusual in an industry whose players bear names like Anomaly and StrawberryFrog. But where Edicoo is located may seem unusual: in Erbil, in the autonomous Kurdistan region of Iraq.

headline.main: The Man in the Grey Flannel Dishdasha?
